name: ListPagerdutyTeams
description:
Retrieve a list of teams from your PagerDuty account.

This tool retrieves a list of teams from your PagerDuty account, possibly filtered by a search query. Teams comprise users and escalation policies representing organizational groups. Use this tool to get insights into team structures and members.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: String used as a versioning header to specify the API response format. This helps in ensuring the correct version of data is returned.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: The content type for the request header, typically set to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of teams to return per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset to start returning team results from in pagination.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: filter_by_name_query
parameters.description: Specify a query to filter teams by name. Only teams with names matching this query will be returned.

value_schema.description: Filters the result, showing only the records whose name matches the query.

parameters.name: include_total_in_response
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total count of results in the response for pagination. This may impact response time.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filters the result, showing only the records whose name matches the query.

value_schema.description: Filters the result, showing only the records whose name matches the query.

parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.
